inclusion.criterion: Must sign an Informed Consent Form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: More than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be potential for benefit from treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Capable and willing to comply with all study procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Significant medical conditions or Investigator decision not to include the participant
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Allergies to the study drug or similar drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Recent participation in another clinical trial
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Problems experienced in a previous HE trial
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or at risk of pregnancy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Active or latent bacterial or viral Infections
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation, with a history of treatment response. However, recent rising white count and lymphadenopathy may indicate disease progression.
